# Private Dog Training (Purchase training sessions)

##  Private Dog Training (Purchase training sessions)

What you get:

• Personalised guidance and in-depth instruction.

• Tailor-made online course with material added as we go to suit exactly your
needs

• 20 minutes phone call with feedback/guidance for every 60 minute training
session

The prices  

Prices are based on geographic area within Stockholm and Uppsala County.

  
  

Where should we train?

•If you have the opportunity to go to Hundhagen in Vallentuna, you get the
best price and access to the equipment during training.

• Alternatively, we can meet indoors in a heated facility at Karma Hundcenter
in central Stockholm.

• It may be that it suits you best to train at home or in your local area, to
book a home visit select your area in the list, if your area is not available
call/send email/sms for guidance.

  
  

Training package

When you buy a training package, you will receive an email with booking codes
that you can then use to book your training sessions.

\- The 3 hour training package must be used within 6 months from the date of
purchase

\- The 5 hour training package must be used within 9 months from the date of
purchase

  
  

***All ABC dog training customers receive a 20% discount on Hundhagen bookings
for one year from the last purchase***

  

ABC Animals provides high quality dog training in English or Swedish within
Stockholm, Uppsala County and remotely/online.

  

**﻿ABC ANIMALS**

**• Reward-based dog training, inspired by science**

****• Innovative solutions**** **, enhancing well-being**

****  

****  

_Dog training/dog trainer: Obedience, activation, recall, problem behaviour,
aggression, reactivity, separation anxiety, resource guarding, etc. | Central
Stockholm: Kungsholmen, Norrmalm, City, Södermalm, Gamla Stan, Östermalm,
Enskede, Årsta, Farsta, Hägersten, Älvsjö, Skarpnäck, Skärholmen, Bromma,
Hässelby, Vällingby, Rinkeby, Kista, Spånga, Tensta |_ _Northern Stockholm:
Vallentuna, Täby, Täby Kyrkby, Danderyd, Åkersberga, Upplands Väsby, Rotebro,
Roserberg, Arlandastad, Brottby, Kårsta, Sollentuna, Uppsala, Norrtälje_
